projects.title_1: AI-Powered Biodiversity Monitoring on the Edge
projects.description_1: Developed a context-aware hybrid AI pipeline to dramatically improve the efficiency of biodiversity monitoring on low-power devices like the Raspberry Pi. By processing common species on-device and deferring rare ones to a powerful server , this system extends operational lifespan by up to 8x and significantly reduces manual maintenance.
projects.description_2: Tiny Titan is a side-scrolling action game where players control a hero battling waves of enemies while striving to achieve the highest score.
projects.description_3: Developed a multiplayer game platform as part of a team of four. Implemented dynamic game loading, fixed backend bugs, and designed the database schema for efficient data management.
projects.description_4: Built a backend demo for an e-commerce platform integrating MongoDB and Redis. Used Redis for session management and MongoDB for flexible product data storage, deployed on Digital Ocean.
projects.description_5: Developed a hand shape recognition system using TensorFlow with Supervised Learning (linear regression). Implemented multiprocessing and GPU computation for faster processing.
projects.description_6: Created a CLI-based student management system in Python, featuring input sanitation, multi-threading, and data persistence using the Pickle module.
projects.description_7: Designed a C-based interactive CLI tool for managing courses and grades, supporting GPA calculation, data persistence, and input sanitation.
projects.description_8: Developed an AI-powered bus station system integrating voice/image recognition, IoT environmental monitoring, and sustainable energy solutions.
